name: Fairy Biography3: Obsession
description:
Hello, we are Lovely Game, desire, throbbing, we are eager to give you the purest romance.
In order to provide you with a more convenient gaming experience, the official website of Lovely Games has been launched, so that you can get our latest information anytime and anywhere, and if you encounter any problems in the game, you can contact us, discord official Community guidance: https://discord.gg/uYhCmCY6Yy
You can also choose to propose it in the F&Q discussion in the community or in the official Steam group~ Creation is not easy, thank you again for your love.
